|brand = Linksys |model = WRT1200AC |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = (caiman) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 06/08/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys_WRT1200AC_v2 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-WRT1200AC |icid = 3839A-WRT1200AC |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6820;88F6820-A0, C133, (Armada 385); |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.33 GHz |is_doc = yes;1.6 / 1.8 / 2.0 GHz (1.33 GHz); |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6176; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port) |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz SPDT Switch with LNA;Skyworks;SKY85601;;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;RFMD;RFPA5522;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, Gargoyle, LEDE Project, McDebian, OpenWrt,
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/28/2016 |estreldate = 07/2016 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIA00Y4536323 |asin = B00UVN20T0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8864; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Marvell;88W8864; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = MHF4, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *According to Class II Permissive Change documentation submitted :to the FCC on 06/27/2016, this router is "electrically identical" to the :[[Linksys WRT1200AC v1|WRT1200AC v1]]. All information is copied from that device entry.
Per '''Linksys''' (LinksysCares@linksys.com), regarding the WRT1900ACS v1 vs v2, [https://community.linksys.com/t5/Wireless-Routers/WRT1900ACS-V1-vs-V2-hardware-changes/td-p/1047601 the only difference between revisions where the Wi-Fi driver looks up the wireless power tables]. [https://github.com/kaloz/mwlwifi/commit/d59c06448cc438243f0043d8b37485196998b288 Newer devices have the power table + region code embedded, older rev. mvebu routers should use the power table specified in dts'']. :[https://dev.openwrt.org/browser/trunk/target/linux/mvebu/files/arch/arm/boot/dts/armada-385-linksys-caiman.dts?rev=45456 '''armada-385-linksys-caiman.dts''' on the '''OpenWrt''' Trac] showing the powertable used for the WRT1200ACv1
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[https://github.com/Chadster766/McDebian/wiki On the '''McDebian''' Wiki] *{{WPLink|Linksys_routers#WRT1200AC}} *[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series#wrt1200ac WRT1200AC] - [[Marvell]] Armada 385 @1.3GHz (Caiman)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32695-linksys-wrt1200ac-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-router-reviewed On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820; 88F6820-A0 C133 (Armada 385 @1.33GHz) *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32774-linksys-high-gain-antennas-reviewed ''Linksys'' High Gain Antennas Reviewed]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = wrt1200acv2 build 30534 20160901 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRT1900AC Install Guide]
Please insert instructions here
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_wrt1200ac |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt1200ac |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mvebu |subtarget = cortexa9 |arch = arm_cortex-a9_vfpv3 |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
